Hello everyone and welcome to my page! My name is Alymbek and I am a Data/AI Scientist.

Previously, I studied a master degree in Autonomous Systems at the TU Darmstadt. During my studies, I worked on my master's thesis with the title "Learning Vision-Based Tactile Skills for Robotic Architectural Assembly". There I cooperated with two 7 degrees-of-freedom leightweight robotic arms KUKA iiwa. I also know how to teach the robot to play beerpong with a win percentage of ca. 80%.

I am a Technology Consultant at Lufthansa Industry Solutions where I help the customers in building models to extract valuable insights from their business processes.

I was previously a software developer at Varian Medical Systems developing a distributed machine learning portal for medical researchers. We spoke C#, Typescript and T-SQL.

I love my lovely fiancée, guitars, chess, jogging, football, tennis, winter sports, singing and F.C.Barcelona.
